text:
What do you think about this?

I added all but #3.  Its too close for comfort if you know what I mean.
You can appeal and we can put it to the committers, post a bug in
bugzilla, then go back to the bug and create an attachment, post the
logo there with this message and post a note saying "committers please
vote on whether to include this -- andy thought it was too close for
comfort".  (but on one likes a lawsuit ;-) )
creator: lieven.janssen@xt-i.com

text: I guess no answer is an answer in itself, sorry lieven.
creator: poi-support@buni.org
